name: Servo Stabilizer
description: air natural cooled servo stabilizer is filled with Transformer Oil as per standard IS-335-1993. The frame inside the MS tank comprises of buck boost transformer and a variable transformer set, which is immersed in a tank filled with transformer oil. The tank has an oil level indicator and an oil inlet pipe. The tank is supported on four bidirectional wheels for movement. For ratings above 30 Kva three phase and also depending upon the input voltage we recommend oil cooled servo stabilizer.
